testCase.name: index.js routes tests GET /crypto/:cryptoId with invalid param should return 400
index.js routes tests GET /crypto/:cryptoId not found should return 404
index.js routes tests GET /crypto/:cryptoId success returns array
index.js routes tests GET /crypto/:cryptoId/ohlc with invalid param should return 400
index.js routes tests GET /crypto/:cryptoId/ohlc success returns array
index.js routes tests POST /signup missing body should return 400
index.js routes tests POST /signup success should return 201
index.js routes tests POST /login missing body => 400
index.js routes tests POST /login invalid user => 400
index.js routes tests POST /login valid => 200
index.js routes tests GET /check no token => 401
index.js routes tests GET /check invalid token => 401
index.js routes tests GET /check valid token => 200 + user info
index.js routes tests POST /logout => 200 + cleared cookie
index.js routes tests POST /favorites no token => 401
index.js routes tests POST /favorites no cryptoId => 400
index.js routes tests POST /favorites success => 201
index.js routes tests GET /favorites no token => 401
index.js routes tests GET /favorites success => array
index.js routes tests DELETE /favorites/:cryptoID no token => 401
index.js routes tests DELETE /favorites/:cryptoID success => 200
index.js routes tests POST /alerts no token => 401
index.js routes tests POST /alerts invalid body => 400
index.js routes tests POST /alerts success => 201
index.js routes tests GET /alerts no token => 401
index.js routes tests GET /alerts success => array
